casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Benjamin GATTI. No. 678P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of December 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal and Alternatively Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
